summary: powerpc/64e: Fix early TLB miss with KUAP
details:
powerpc/64e: Fix early TLB miss with KUAP

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 87784a09789aa03f56c6bdb5e3c71110bf57dbf2, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 57bc963837f5f1753a1d51fada54a32b8a84fdc3. For more details please see the references link.
